title: BACK OFFICE SERVICE
excerpt: We are available to support you on digital services. Our expert consultants are happy to help you.

introText.heading: Mitech specializes in technological and IT-related services such as product engineering, warranty management, building cloud, infrastructure, network, etc.
introText.text:
Weâ€™re available for 8 hours a day!
Contact to require a detailed analysis and assessment of your plan.

faq.title: Data Management and indexing
faq.desc: Xubisoft, a world leader in BPO services supporting organizations with premium quality data management services covering their customized business needs. We are concerned with receiving haphazard distorted data from clients & organizing, sorting, & categorizing this into an indexed database.

faq.title: Bulk Scanning & Data Entry
faq.desc: we use best-in-class technology to make sure all of your data, in different formats, is scanned into a common format accessible and retrieval able to all. Xubisoft uses state-of-the-art technology for the automation of the data entry process.

faq.title: Data Mining & Invoice Processing
faq.desc: Xubisoft has in its disposition extensive data mining services having the capability of rendering added value to organizational operations from a diverse range of industries. We keep track of partial, due, and paid invoices along with digitization by converting paper invoices into electronic format.

faq.title: OCR Services
faq.desc: We can handle all of your data conversion and OCR scanning needs. Our techniques and talent can deliver accurate results quickly.

items.title: Data Security
items.desc: we understand that the data which you are digitizing holds mission-critical importance. Protecting the sanctity and integrity of your data from fraudulent access and manipulation holds the top of our priority lists.

items.title: 24*7 Work
items.desc: We are one of the organizations that operate round the clock. If you want to ask anything or have a query to clear feel free to contact our executive who will be more than happy to help you out.

items.title: Scalability
items.desc: We have the flexibility to deliver a customized solution that can be adapted and scaled with your requirements even if they change during the course of the project.

items.title: Data Quality
items.desc: All of our processes are in alignment with its standards. The team of quality assurance that we have in our disposition will work closely to make sure 100% data accuracy.

items.title: Data Assurance
items.desc: We have benchmarked standards of quality control and our quality assurance team strictly adheres to the protocols before clearing a project for final submission.

items.title: Productive Services
items.desc: When you hire us & invest your scarce monetary resources, you can be sure of having nothing less than the best service from our side. We are not done until you are satisfied.
